https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/2UFyZPIBqD4lcEQuVZeg0rbz3Ou.jpg In an attempt to solve their marriage problems, Eric and Mari take a trip to the Mexican southeast, but she disappears under mysterious circumstances. On his way back to Mexico City, Eric meets Narciso, a mysterious man, and gives him a ride. Eric describes a series of events which finally lead him to a revelation about the time he shared with Mari. Between Shadows
